package.name: sift
package.description: Sift (sonic-php) provides SIMD-accelerated JSON parsing for PHP via sonic-rs. Features include lazy parsing for extracting specific values from massive JSON documents without full DOM construction, a chainable Query API, memory-efficient zero-copy parsing, and comprehensive security hardening with input size limits, depth limits, and overflow protection.
package.notes:
Initial beta release of Sift (sonic-php)
Features: - Sonic::get() - Lazy JSON pointer extraction without full decode - Sonic::decode() - High-speed full JSON parsing - Sonic::isValid() - SIMD-accelerated JSON validation - Sift::query() - Lazy Query API with chainable navigation
Security: - Input size validation: 64 MB maximum to prevent memory exhaustion attacks - Nesting depth limits: 512 levels maximum to prevent stack overflow - Pointer segment limits: 256 segments maximum to prevent DoS via long paths - Integer overflow protection: Large u64 values safely convert to float - Negative index validation: Array indices must be non-negative - Error message sanitization: Prevents information leakage
Technical: - Integration with sonic-rs for SIMD JSON parsing - ext-php-rs bindings for PHP 8.x - Zero-copy string handling where possible - Arc-based JSON sharing in Query API for efficient memory usage
